subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_hi: मौर्य साम्राज्य का स्थापना करने वाला व्यक्ति कौन था?
explanation_en: Chandragupta Maurya founded the Maurya Empire in 322 BCE.
explanation_hi: चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य ने 322 ईसा पूर्व में मौर्य साम्राज्य की स्थापना की।

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: Who was the greatest Mauryan Emperor?
question_hi: मौर्य साम्राज्य का सबसे बड़ा सम्राट कौन था?
explanation_en: Ashoka is considered as the greatest Mauryan Emperor due to his extensive empire and spread of Buddhism.
explanation_hi: अशोक को उनके विस्तृत साम्राज्य और बौद्ध धर्म के प्रसार के कारण सबसे बड़े मौर्य सम्राट माने जाते हैं।

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: What was the name of the Mauryan capital?
question_hi: मौर्य साम्राज्य की राजधानी का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Pataliputra was the capital of the Mauryan Empire.
explanation_hi: पाटलिपुत्र मौर्य साम्राज्य की राजधानी थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: Who was the Mauryan Emperor who was known for his non-violent policies?
question_hi: वह मौर्य सम्राट कौन था जो अपनी non-violent नीतियों के लिए जाने जाते थे?
explanation_en: Ashoka is known for his non-violent policies and spread of Buddhism.
explanation_hi: अशोक अपने non-violent नीतियों और बौद्ध धर्म के प्रसार के लिए जाने जाते हैं।

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: What was the name of Ashoka's wife?
question_hi: अशोक की पत्नी का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Dharma was the wife of Ashoka.

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: What was the name of Ashoka's son?
question_hi: अशोक का पुत्र का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Mahindra was the son of Ashoka.

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: Who was the Mauryan Emperor who defeated Alexander the Great?
question_hi: अलेक्जेंडर द ग्रेट को हराने वाले मौर्य सम्राट कौन थे?
explanation_en: Chandragupta Maurya defeated Alexander the Great.
explanation_hi: चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य ने अलेक्जेंडर द ग्रेट को हराया।

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: What was the name of the famous Mauryan administrator?
question_hi: प्रसिद्ध मौर्य प्रशासक का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Ratthaka was a famous Mauryan administrator.
explanation_hi: रठाक एक प्रसिद्ध मौर्य प्रशासक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: What was the name of the Mauryan economic policy?
question_hi: मौर्य आर्थिक नीति का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Shreni Vritti was the Mauryan economic policy.
explanation_hi: श्रेणी वृत्ति मौर्य आर्थिक नीति थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Maurya Samrajya: Chandragupta, Ashoka aur Prashasan
question_en: Who was the Mauryan Emperor who built the famous Buddhist Stupa?
question_hi: प्रसिद्ध बौद्ध स्तूप बनाने वाले मौर्य सम्राट कौन थे?
explanation_en: Ashoka built the famous Buddhist Stupa.
explanation_hi: अशोक ने प्रसिद्ध बौद्ध स्तूप का निर्माण किया।
